doc:
Mandy Bonhomme https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mandy_Bonhomme 0 Amanda Goodman, better known by her former stage name Mandy Bonhomme, is an American actress and voice actress who has worked on the properties of Central Park Media, Media Blasters and The Right Stuf International. Bonhomme studied acting in New York and is best known for voicing Juri Arisugawa and Keiko Sonoda in Revolutionary Girl Utena, as well as Komaki Asagiri in Genshiken and its spinoff Kujibiki Unbalance. She also lends her voice to video games and audiobooks. Non-anime work includes voicing the Shadowy Woman in the Nicktoons series Speed Racer: The Next Generation and Amber, one of the Solid Gold Elite Dancers in the machinima This Spartan Life. Bonhomme currently resides in New York City. Amanda_Goodman , better_known by her_former_stage_name_Mandy_Bonhomme , is an_American_actress_and_voice_actress who has_worked on the_properties of Central_Park_Media , Media_Blasters and The_Right_Stuf_International . Bonhomme studied_acting in New_York and is_best_known for voicing Juri_Arisugawa and Keiko_Sonoda in Revolutionary_Girl_Utena , as_well_as Komaki_Asagiri in Genshiken and its_spinoff_Kujibiki_Unbalance . She also lends her voice to video_games_and_audiobooks . Non-anime_work includes_voicing the_Shadowy_Woman in the_Nicktoons_series_Speed_Racer : The_Next_Generation and Amber , one of the_Solid_Gold_Elite_Dancers in the_machinima This_Spartan_Life . Bonhomme currently resides in New_York_City .
